channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A New Phone Scanner That Detects Spyware Has Already Found 7 Pegasus Infections
item.description: The mobile device security firm iVerify has been offering a tool since May that makes spyware scanning accessible to anyone—and it's already turning u...

item.title: AWS brings third-party apps to its SageMaker AI platform
item.description: SageMaker has long been AWS’s fully managed platform for building, training and deploying machine learning and generative AI models. Over time, howeve...

item.title: AWS makes its SageMaker HyperPod AI platform more efficient for training LLMs
item.description: At last year’s AWS re:Invent conference, Amazon’s cloud computing unit launched SageMaker HyperPod, a platform for building foundation models. It’s no...

item.title: EU could target ultra low-cost e-tailers like Shein and Temu with package handling fee or import tax
item.description: The European Union is drowning under cheap packages coming from Asian online retailers, starting with ultra low-cost e-tailers AliExpress, Shein and T...

item.title: Meta jumps aboard the nuclear-powered data center bandwagon
item.description: Meta wants nuclear power developers to help it build 1 to 4 gigawatts of new electricity generating capacity. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. ...

item.title: 17 Gifts for People Who Are Perpetually Cold (2024)
item.description: From tiny mugs to a backyard hot tub, these picks will make your loved ones feel warm and fuzzy—inside and out.

item.title: Frère’s fashion brand is upgrading the ‘tech bro’ look
item.description: What do Tim Cook, Jay Z, and Fred Ehrsam, co-founder of Coinbase, all have in common? That would be their interest in Frère, a bespoke ready-to-wear c...

item.title: AI-Powered Robots Can Be Tricked Into Acts of Violence
item.description: Researchers hacked several robots infused with large language models, getting them to behave dangerously—and pointing to a bigger problem ahead.

item.title: She Was a Russian Socialite and Influencer. Cops Say She’s a Crypto Laundering Kingpin
item.description: Western authorities say they’ve identified a network that found a new way to clean drug gangs’ dirty cash. WIRED gained exclusive access to the invest...

item.title: Senators Warn the Pentagon: Get a Handle on China’s Telecom Hacking
